name: Hearing Aids
description: The evaluation usually lasts Ito 1-1/2 hours. Your appointment will include the following: - Patient interview. Please be prepared to discuss your concerns and any medical history relating to your hearing problem. - Otoscopic evaluation. Visual examination of the ear canal and eardrum. - Comprehensive audiologic evaluation. Consists of the following different examinations to determine if a hearing loss exists, its type and its severity: - Pure-tone audiometry: The audiologist records the softest
